textBeforeTable: Kettering University EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION Founded 1919 as The School of Automotive Trades. Owned by General Motors between 1926-82, when it was known as the General Motors Institute. In 1998, the name of the institution was changed to Kettering University, after Charles F. Kettering. Location: Flint, MI Founding Date: 1919 Official Website: http://www.kettering.edu/ STUDENTS All Names Living people Dead people Band Names Book Titles Movie Titles Full Text for Search: This is a beta version of NNDB
